`v0.0.4`_
=============

Added
-----

* Set file modes for extracted files.
* More unit test.

Changed
-------

* Travis-CI test on python 3.7.

Fixed
-----

* Fix to set extracted files timestamp as same as archived.


`v0.0.3`_
=============

Added
-----

* PyPi package index.

Fixed
-----

* setup: set universal = 0 because only python 3 is supported.

`v0.0.2`_
=============

Changed
-------

* refactoring all the code.
